de.unibox.model.database

Class DatabaseAction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unibox.model.database.DatabaseAction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminStatement, CategoryInsert, GameInsert, PasswordUpdate, PlayerInsert, ResultInsert, SelectionQuery

    public abstract class DatabaseAction<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DatabaseAction is an abstract generic class to handle different kinds of database actions.
